name: Dist
description:
A small fantasy roguelike made in Python + Libtcod.

~

I made this game in early 2017 following the libtcod tutorial and I figured I'd finally upload it onto here. There are some simple things like the weird black flashing squares that I need to fix  and there's some stuff I (still) want to add so I'll try and get to that

~

Instructions:

  • Move around with your arrow keys
  • Hover over items with your mouse to see what they are
  • Press "g" to pick them up
  • Press "i" to see your inventory
  • Press "c" to see your character info
  • Press "d" to drop an item from your inventory

Tip: if your inventory gets too big, you can always click on a menu to select something!
